text: (napiyē!) Evarkaḷ ciramaṅkaḷaic cakittut taṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṉ tiru mukattaiyē nāṭi avaṉaiyē kālaiyilum, mālaiyilum (pirārttaṉai ceytu) aḻaittuk koṇṭirukkiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷuṭaṉ um'maiyum nīr ākkik koḷvīrāka. Ivvulaka alaṅkārattai nīr virumpi attakaiya (nalla)varkaḷai viṭṭu umatu kaṇkaḷait tiruppi viṭātīr. Taṉ carīra iccaiyaip piṉpaṟṟiyataṉ kāraṇamāka evaṉuṭaiya uḷḷattai nam'mait tiyāṉippatiliruntu nām tiruppi viṭṭōmō avaṉukkum nīr kīḻppaṭiyātīr. Avaṉuṭaiya kāriyam ellai kaṭantu viṭṭatu
